headline: Howard Lutnick's Cantor buys $126 million of surprising AI stock

The former bitcoin miner has quickly evolved into a serious player in AI infrastructure, and Cantor’s endorsement adds another layer of ...

headline: Needham Raises Micron (MU) Target to $450, Maintains Buy Rating
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the 10 Best Stocks to Buy in 2026 According to Reddit. On February 17, 2026, Needham analyst N. headline: Deutsche Bank Raises Micron Price Target to $500 on Tightening DRAM Supply
summary: We recently published an article titled 12 Best Data Storage Stocks to Buy Right Now. On February 10, Deutsche Bank raised its price target on Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) to $500 from $300 and maintained a Buy rating, citing tightening DRAM supply conditions and elevated memory pricing. The firm projects that industry shortages could persist […]
